game.name: Easy puzzle: Animals 2
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: This is a logical game in which the goal of the game is to rearrange the tiles to get the final picture. In the pictures that need to be collected, different animals are depicted
game.shortDescriptionEn: This is a logical game in which the goal of the game is to rearrange the tiles to get the final picture. In the pictures that need to be collected, different animals are depicted
